titleInfo.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2745, STANDARD MERGER AND ACQUISITION REVIEWS THROUGH EQUAL RULES ACT OF 2015, AND PROVIDING FOR PROCEEDINGS DURING THE PERIOD FROM MARCH 24, 2016, THROUGH APRIL...

extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2745, STANDARD MERGER AND ACQUISITION REVIEWS THROUGH EQUAL RULES ACT OF 2015, AND PROVIDING FOR PROCEEDINGS DURING THE PERIOD FROM MARCH 24, 2016, THROUGH APRIL...; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 45

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Standard Merger and Acquisition Reviews Through Equal Rules Act_Rule for consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 653, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2745) to amend the Clayton Act and the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the Federal Trade Commission shall exercise authority with respect to mergers only under the Clayton Act and only in the same procedural manner as the Attorney General exercises such authority, and providing for proceedings during the period from March 24, 2016, through April 11, 2016, by a recorded vote of 233 ayes to 154 noes, Roll No. 132, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 231 yeas to 154 nays, Roll No. 131.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Standard Merger and Acquisition Reviews Through Equal Rules Act_Rule for consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 653, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2745) to amend the Clayton Act and the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the Federal Trade Commission shall exercise authority with respect to mergers only under the Clayton Act and only in the same procedural manner as the Attorney General exercises such authority, and providing for proceedings during the period from March 24, 2016, through April 11, 2016, by a recorded vote of 233 ayes to 154 noes, Roll No. 132, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 231 yeas to 154 nays, Roll No. 131.

extension.searchTitle: PROMOTING WOMEN IN ENTREPRENEURSHIP ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 45

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4742, to authorize the National Science Foundation to support entrepreneurial programs for women, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 383 yeas to 4 nays, Roll No. 133;

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Inspiring the Next Space Pioneers, Innovators, Researchers, and Explorers (INSPIRE) Women Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4755, to inspire women to enter the aerospace field, including science, technology, engineering, and mathematics, through mentorship and outreach, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote 380 yeas to 3 nays, Roll No. 134;

titleInfo.title: WOMEN AIRFORCE SERVICE PILOT ARLINGTON INURNMENT RESTORATION ACT

extension.searchTitle: WOMEN AIRFORCE SERVICE PILOT ARLINGTON INURNMENT RESTORATION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 45

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Women Airforce Service Pilot Arlington Inurnment Restoration Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4336, amended, to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the burial of the cremated remains of persons who served as Women's Air Forces Service Pilots in Arlington National Cemetery, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 385 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 135.
